short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organise your Bookmarks on your new tab with options to create folders with bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with Bookmarks New Tab. This tool transforms your new tabs into an organized space, where you can neatly categorize all your bookmarks into unlimited custom folders. Access your favorite sites quickly and effortlessly right from your new tab. Simply right-click on any page, choose 'save', and assign the bookmark to your preferred folder. Your bookmarks, sorted by folder, will then appear conveniently in your new tabs.

By clicking Add To Chrome I agree to changing the browser new tab to that provided by the service and agree to the privacy policy and terms of use below.  Please note this extension changes your new tab search results provided by Microsoft Bing.  To revert make you can disable the extension or remove it at any time.

For more information:
Privacy Policy: https://bookmark-newtab.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://bookmark-newtab.com/terms-and-conditions
